nodes.text: A Holographic shell was a large-scale type of Holographic disguise matrix used by vehicles and starships, and cost 5,500 credits.

Using a combination of optical camouflage and high-resolution holograms, a holographic shell could be used to create a disguised exterior that was extremely difficult to detect. Holographic shells had a number of drawbacks, however; the system memory only had the capacity for a single disguise which had to be programmed in ahead of time, and could not be changed on the fly. Additionally, the disguise was only useful at a range of several or more meters - closely investigating or touching the disguise would ruin the illusion.
